scripts.build:docker: npm run build:docker:server && npm run build:docker:audit-worker && npm run build:docker:import-worker
scripts.release-deploy:prod: npm version patch && npm run build:docker && ./scripts/release-deploy.sh production
scripts.release-deploy:dev: npm version patch && npm run build:docker && ./scripts/release-deploy.sh development
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start-server" "npm run start-worker" "npm run start-import-worker"
